Title: ROS Python Tutorial
Description: A short introduction to the Robot Operating System and how to program Python packages.

Title: HPC DNA Tutorial
Description: How to work with DNA sequence data in a Linux cluster environment.

Title: Geospatial Plotting in Python
Description: Introduction to plotting maps and other geospatial data in Python.

Title: Explainable AI: Intro and Challenges
Description: After a brief intro to XAI, we explore many of its pitfalls.

Title: Linux for Researchers
Description: A collection of helpful hints for researchers relying on Linux systems.

Title: TAI4ES Summer School
Description: I led a session about XAI methods applied to explain FogNet, a 3D CNN for coastal fog prediction.

Title: Mobile Robot Path Planning
Description: A presentation on path planning techniques.

Title: Efficient Wireless Sensor Networks
Description: A presentation on efficient algorithms for WSNs.

Title: FogNet
Description: A 3D CNN for coastal fog prediction.

Title: SparkMet
Description: A transformer-based architecture (and data processing tools) for geoscience models.

Title: conch
Description: Path planning for autonomous surface vehicles that uses water current forecasts for efficient routes.

Title: whelk
Description: Tools to pull data from ocean models (NECOFS & NGOFS) and store as rasters.

Title: PSO Path Planning
Description: A simple PSO-based path planner in Matlab. Messy code.

Title: Dynamic Programming Path Planner
Description: Implementation of dynammic programming mobile robot path planner from paper by Kwan S. Kwok and Brian J. Driessen

Title: fujin
Description: An energy-efficient path planner based on game theory for surface vessels. Plans an optimal route based on water current forecasts.

Title: nir2watermap
Description: Uses the NIR channel in aerial images to convert each pixel to water or land.

Title: EMILY USV configs
Description: Configurations for an EMILY USV that has been modified for autonomous control using Pixhawk.
